metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Dickon, the human of the Steeps' Drunkards vignette
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -104, 32, -93- Talk to the human male behind The Blushing Mermaid,

0.speaker: Dickon
0.text: That plum prosecco! Oh, gods, never again, never again... Solemn oath, solemn vow, solemn... wuurrgh!

1.speaker: Dickon
1.text: You don't scare me, tough-buckets! I'll take you all on, all three or, or six of you, or... wuurrgh! Gah!

2.speaker: Dickon
2.text: Look out, saer! Move! Don't want to puke on your shoes. Wuurrgh...
